steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction start --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction add ghs.googlehosted.com. --name=${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --type=CNAME --ttl=300 --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction execute --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction abort --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta run domain-mappings create --platform=managed --service=staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE} --domain=${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} --region=${_GCP_REGION} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: sed -e 's/#_ADD_NAME/staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-add/g; s/#_AGGREGATE_NAME/staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-aggregate/g; s/#_HOST/${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network/g; s/#_GCP_PROJECT/${_GCP_PROJECT}/g; s/#_GCP_REGION/${_GCP_REGION}/g; s/#_TITLE/Staging ${_TITLE}/g' doc.json > doc.staging.json

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta run services update staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE} --platform=managed --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} --region=${_GCP_REGION} --set-env-vars="^|^ENDPOINTS_SERVICE_NAME=${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.staging.sustainer.network|ESP_ARGS=--rollout_strategy=managed,${_ESP_OPTIONS}"

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta functions add-iam-policy-binding staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-add --member serviceAccount:31066734336-compute@developer.gserviceaccount.com --role roles/cloudfunctions.invoker

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta functions add-iam-policy-binding staging-${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-aggregate --member serviceAccount:31066734336-compute@developer.gserviceaccount.com --role roles/cloudfunctions.invoker

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction start --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction add ghs.googlehosted.com. --name=${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.sustainer.network --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --type=CNAME --ttl=300 --project=${_GCP_PROJECT}

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction execute --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta dns record-sets transaction abort --zone=${_GCP_DNS_ZONE} --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: gcloud beta run domain-mappings create --platform=managed --service=${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE} --domain=${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.sustainer.network --project=${_GCP_PROJECT} --region=${_GCP_REGION} || exit 0

steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/gcloud
args: sed -e 's/#_ADD_NAME/${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-add/g; s/#_AGGREGATE_NAME/${_SERVICE}-${_TYPE}-aggregate/g; s/#_HOST/${_TYPE}.${_SERVICE}.sustainer.network/g; s/#_GCP_PROJECT/${_GCP_PROJECT}/g; s/#_GCP_REGION/${_GCP_REGION}/g; s/#_TITLE/${_TITLE}/g' doc.json > doc.production.json
